meaningMnemonic: Don't think of this as a <kanji>juvenile</kanji> <kanji>talk</kanji>. Think of 話 the vocab word, which means "story." If you do that, you get a "juvenile story." What's a juvenile story? It's a <vocabulary>children's story</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
